text.value: Can you please add folia support ?

I understand that "getScheduler" is showing as red in your IDE. This is likely because the Folia API is not recognized in your current project setup. To resolve this:
1. Make sure you have the Folia API jar in your project's dependencies. 2. If you're using Maven, add the Folia repository and dependency to your pom.xml file. 3. If using an IDE, refresh your project and update your dependencies.
Once you've added the Folia API to your project, the "getScheduler" method should be recognized, and the red highlighting should disappear.
